sentences.sContent: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.sCn: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.sContent: The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.sCn: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

sentences.sContent: He could not afford luxury food on his pay.
sentences.sCn: 凭他的薪水，他吃不起奢侈的食品。

words.tran: 奢侈的；丰富的；放纵的；特级的
繁茂的；丰富的；奢华的；肥沃的

trans.tranOther: very great comfort and pleasure, such as you get from expensive food, beautiful houses, cars etc
A luxury item is something expensive which is not necessary but which gives you pleasure
